description: Controls and utilities for Windows 8 XAML store applications.
releaseNotes:
* 1.1.0.4 Release *

      *****************************
      * Time control
      * Popup manager
      
      *****************************
      * 1.1.0.3 Nuget Release content fix *

      * 1.1.0.2 Nuget Release content fix *

      * 1.1.0.1 Nuget Release *

      
      * 1.1.0.0 First Release *

      *****************************
      * Page header textblock with global navigation menu.

      * Month control update - Move page up if month textbox is behind keyboard.

      * AppBar button - Customzation option and more than six menu items. (incopatible with 1.0.0.0).


      * 1.0.0.0 Beta release *

      *****************************
      * Month control with keyboard like layout.

      * AppBar button with customizable popup menu.

      * Count converter to count a property of elements in a nested collecton during binding.
      * Tap effect.

      * Date time converter for data binding.

      * Concatenation converter to join a property of elements in a nested collecton during binding.
title: Windows Store Application Library
